long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Use this extension to access ChatGPT all the time. You can select any keyword when accessing the website and right-click to select and use the built-in ChatGPT function in the widget to answer that keyword.

In particular, the pre-installed utility helps you to selectively rewrite the text on Facebook.

You can set up text templates to search using ChatGPT in the settings.

Note: An ApiKey ChatGPT is required to use it.
User manual:
1. Select any text on the web page
2. Right click
3. Hover over GPT-For-Facebook and left click on options to search with ChatGPT
